title: Special Edition, The Mueller Report
itunes:title: Special Edition, The Mueller Report
description:
The Mueller report has arrived, complete with redactions. For analysis, Kevin spoke with Shannon Pettypiece, Bloomberg News White House reporter. Jason Miller, Former Senior Communications Advisor for the Trump campaign and former Communications Director for Trump transition, and Managing Director, Teneo Strategy. Dave Brown, Democratic Strategist & former advisor to Sen. Patty Murray. Congressman Denver Riggleman, R-Virginia. Congressman John Garamendi, D-CA. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
